snippet: Two weeks on, many people who work near Emanuel A.M.E. Church are pondering lives forever changed by the shooting deaths of nine people there.
abstract: Emanuel African Methodist Church in Charleston, SC, continues to attract mourners, sympathizers and makeshift memorials two weeks after killing of nine black parishioners there, transforming street and neighborhood around it; many describe increased sense of community and common purpose in aftermath of tragedy.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks on, many people who work near Emanuel A.M.E. Church are pondering lives forever changed by the shooting deaths of nine people there.

headline.print_headline: 2 Weeks After Killings, Memorials Still Grow
headline.main: 2 Weeks After Charleston Killings, Memorials Still Grow

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
